<https://twitter.com/JNYBGR|@JNYBGR>: :movie_camera: Announcing Remotion - a framework for making videos in React!

The video below was written entirely in React, here is the source code! <https://github.com/JonnyBurger/remotion-trailer>

:ledger: Docs: <https://remotion.dev>
:atom_symbol: Github: <https://github.com/JonnyBurger/remotion>
